<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Nexian Mystic](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=91)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Impossible Lands

</column>

Your initiations into the Nexian mysteries and the philosophies of the Arclords of Nex grant you a preternatural comprehension of the arcane underpinnings of existence.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill related to one plane of your choice (other than the [material plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1)). You gain the [Arcane Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=754) skill feat.
name: Nexian Mystic
